name: Robin Hood: Archer Sniper
description:
Join the epic battle agains the forces of the evil Sheriff in Robin Hood - Archer Sniper.

Using your archery skills to battle the Sheriff's men deep in Sherwood Forest, conducting raids and using precision bow and arrow shots to turn the tide of the battle. Uses touch mechanics to allow for precise aiming, and a physics engine to simulate arrow movement.

Key Features Include:

* Gorgeous 3D Forest Environments and Models
* Precision Bow and Arrow Aiming Mechanics
* Hold and Release Archery Shoot Mode
* Conduct Enemy Ambushes Deep in the Forest
* Hit Enemies with HeadShots for Bonus Damage
* Battle Enemy Knights, Archers, Footmen and More
* Multiple Levels to Complete
* Mow Down Hordes of Enemies with Your Bow and Arrow
* Fast Paced Action Intensive Gameplay
* Many Different Enemy Types
* No Ads!
